title: runtime/trace: flaky TestTraceSymbolize, TestTraceStartStop
body:
ok  	runtime/debug	0.013s
--- FAIL: TestTraceSymbolize (0.18s)
	trace_stack_test.go:83: failed to listen: listen tcp 120.192.83.162:0: bind: cannot assign requested address
--- FAIL: TestTraceStartStop (0.00s)
	trace_test.go:43: failed to start tracing: runtime error: tracing is already enabled
FAIL
FAIL	runtime/pprof	11.671s
ok  	sort	0.094s

on ubuntu 15.04 amd64
